Ho aspettato parecchio per fare una recensione XD Il single player: oltre ai suoi ben fatti rompicapo, racconta la voglia di evadere di Chell e l' incontro con l'impacciato Wheatley doppiato da una bravissimo Stephen Merchant, che adoro. La storia si basa sulla presa di potere e come certi personaggi cambiano da una situazione all'altra. Glados (Ellen McLain) ha pi√π carisma e lati nascosti. Le mappe create dai giocatori nel Workshop rendono il gioco longevo e sempre nuovo da scoprire, ci sono autori veramente bravi che creano nuove storie e rompicapo notevoli.

Fun game, though I didn't really like it as much as the first game. There were too many puzzles where I was really confused usually because the room was too big to clearly see where I was supposed to portal to, or where I needed to place gel. The amount of new mechanics were nice, and though I really had fun with the gel, the gel puzzles were probably the ones that took me the longest to figure out because of how few directions they gave with them, as well as how the gel can go almost anywhere. Still a great game regardless, the story was good, the test chambers parts were nice, and I had a great time.

"Oh... It's you.
It's been a long time. How have you been?
I've been really busy being dead. You know, after you MURDERED ME.
Okay. Look. We both said a lot of things that you're going to regret. But I think we can put our differences behind us. For science. You monster.
I will say, though, that since you went to all the trouble of waking me up, you must really, really love to test.
I love it too. There's just one small thing we need to take care of first..."

Portal 2 has to be my favourite game of all time. It is also one of the best Valve games and one of the best video game sequels of all time.

This game takes everything the first game was good at and improves and adds upon it a lot. Gameplay-wise it is still one of the best puzzle games out there, but this time with a great story, great humour and incredible worldbuilding.
 
I would recommend this game to anyone who is even slightly interested in puzzle games.
